messages.content:
分析一下这个文件里的销售数据

已上传文件: 第六市场部曾令阳.xlsx (EXCEL) - URL: https://pub-1c285312f65240b89d105dde0d6ec369.r2.dev/bpDhLIQXoI8JEDoL2gn_r/1754726732527__.xlsx
我来帮您分析这个销售数据文件。让我先导入并查看数据结构。

function.name: execute_sql
function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT 
  单据类型,
  COUNT(*) as 数量,
  SUM(销售收入) as 总收入,
  SUM(销售毛利) as 总毛利
FROM market_dept_data 
GROUP BY 单据类型
ORDER BY 总收入 DESC"}

function.name: execute_sql
function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT 
  单位全名,
  COUNT(*) as 交易数量,
  SUM(销售收入) as 总收入,
  SUM(销售毛利) as 总毛利,
  ROUND(AVG(销售毛利), 2) as 平均毛利
FROM market_dept_data 
GROUP BY 单位全名
ORDER BY 总收入 DESC"}

messages.content: 完美！现在我有了所有需要的数据，让我生成一个专业的HTML销售分析报告：

function.name: export_query_result
function.arguments: {"query":"SELECT * FROM market_dept_data ORDER BY 日期 DESC LIMIT 10","output_path":"latest_transactions.csv","format":"csv"}

function.name: export_query_result
function.arguments:
{"format":"json","output_path":"sales_summary.json","query":"SELECT 
  '总体概况' as 类别,
  '总交易数' as 指标, 
  CAST(COUNT(*) as TEXT) as 数值
FROM market_dept_data
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  '总体概况' as 类别,
  '总销售收入' as 指标, 
  CAST(SUM(销售收入) as TEXT) as 数值
FROM market_dept_data
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  '总体概况' as 类别,
  '总销售毛利' as 指标, 
  CAST(SUM(销售毛利) as TEXT) as 数值
FROM market_dept_data"}

function.name: execute_sql
function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT 
  销售代理,
  COUNT(*) as 交易数,
  SUM(销售收入) as 总收入,
  SUM(销售毛利) as 总毛利,
  ROUND(SUM(销售毛利)*100.0/SUM(销售收入), 2) as 毛利率
FROM market_dept_data 
WHERE 销售代理 IS NOT NULL AND 销售收入 > 0
GROUP BY 销售代理
ORDER BY 总收入 DESC
LIMIT 10"}

messages.content:
{"content":[{"type":"text","text":"{

  "row_count": 10,
  "columns": [

请你给我html格式的报告，不要使用 export_query_result


已上传文件: 第六市场部曾令阳.xlsx (EXCEL) - URL: https://pub-1c285312f65240b89d105dde0d6ec369.r2.dev/bpDhLIQXoI8JEDoL2gn_r/1754726732527__.xlsx
好的！我将直接为您生成完整的HTML格式销售分析报告。

function.name: execute_sql
function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT 
  strftime('%Y-%m', 日期) as 月份,
  COUNT(*) as 交易数量,
  SUM(销售收入) as 月度收入,
  SUM(销售毛利) as 月度毛利,
  ROUND(SUM(销售毛利)*100.0/SUM(销售收入), 2) as 毛利率
FROM market_dept_data 
WHERE 销售收入 > 0
GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%m', 日期)
ORDER BY 月份"}
